DOC.criteria: Serum B12 > 118pmol/L ; Serum creatinine < 125micromol/L ; Plasma total homocysteine < 26micromol/L . Cardiovascular disease , cancer , rheumatoid arthritis , epilepsy , gastrointestinal disorder ; Use drug interfere folate metabolism ; Use B vitamin within period three month prior study .
